introduce_product: These new models are based on the BGD-500 Series, making them recreations of the very first DW-520 BABY-G model.  This lineup combines popular square design with a choice of black and pale pink color variations.  The matte finish materials of the case and band create a sharp, clean image, and monotone coloring allows these models to go well with simple, adult casual fashions.  Water resistant up to 200 meters, these models are a great choice for wear on the beach, around the pool, or other locations where water is present.

list_spec_icon.detail_spec_icon: World Time for 31 time zones (48 cities + UTC), city code display, daylight saving on/off
